abstracts.cdata!:
The project will consist of: the
            development of 11,000 ha in the Sategui-Deressia plain in
            southwest Chad for rice cultivation under irrigation,
            including the construction of a canal from the Logone river,
            polders, feeder roads, a rice mill, houses, offices and
            storage facilities; the carrying out of research and seed
            multiplication; the provision of extension services; and the
            in-service training of Chadian personnel eventual management
            of the project.
